name: Overdue books
query:
SELECT 
    name AS "Loan ID:Link/Loan",
    member AS "Member:Link/Member",
    book AS "Book:Link/Book",
    due_date AS "Due Date:Date",
    DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) AS "Days Overdue:Int"
FROM `tabLoan`
WHERE docstatus = 1
AND type = 'Borrow'
AND due_date < CURDATE()
ORDER BY due_date ASC;
